name: Project Puzzle 2
description:
Where are you? Oh, that's right, your trapped! You are trapped in this alternate universe, with some puzzles. It has some lore, story, and more! This is a sequel to this game. Play that one first to understand where you are, and why you are here!

Hey! Guess what! There is an enemy now that will chase you! It appears once, but you will need to play to find out!

Your goal: Escape this alternate universe, solving puzzles along the way!
